narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Plus Co. Inc. is a Day Training, Developmentally Disabled Services provider based in Nashua, NH. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $13.8M in Medicaid payments across 82K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $13.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
